channel.title: [PI] PvP based Server: Insane-pkz [PI]
channel.description:
[center]Ok so this is the credits [b]~~~>Shadowspking<~~~ 20%[/b] Pim 30% Exion 25% I am sanity\Sanity 25% [b]@@NOT ME@@[/b][/center]
It's pretty simple server all thow the client is auto cache and I never fixed the cache downloader so... here is cache+client+server
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?7y781i7ndcm8fbb Cache: http://www.mediafire.com/?m5k45tb996v58x6 Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?367c4kcrl0rv1wk Client java stuff (sorry i removed so no one would leech when i had server): http://www.mediafire.com/?4cm9f0gpkmo7gl0
Your gonna have to put the cache in your C drive you can go there by clicking my computer and then clicking c drive...
Once you have downloaded cache you should change chatarea.. (This will remove the Insane-pkz logo on the chat box,All you gotta do is replace this one with the one allready in the cache it should be in file "Sprites") Download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?27g8dj97qqjfoyv
Here are some pictures.... Home: [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/1588/home1cl.png[/img] [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/6514/home2s.png[/img]
[center]And here are just a couple of features... (Showing the pvp area and stuff )[/center] [center][img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/7286/spikesv.png[/img] [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/6739/bossg.png[/img] [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/6739/bossg.png[/img] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9762/lunar.png[/img] [img]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/3125/mini.png[/img] [img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/9460/pktele.png[/img] [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/6623/pkpstore.png[/img][b][/b] [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/3349/pvpb.png[/img] [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/3808/skillingu.png[/img] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/4464/slayer1.png[/img] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/958/slayer2.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/5756/slayer3.png[/img] [img]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/3738/worldmap.png[/img][/center]
And there is much much more if you want to remove claws from pkshop look for [code]Case 11777[/code] In shopassistant.java just remove the Case 11777 and the return 300; (or what ever the return was...)
Please leave negative and positive comments about the server..
[b]THIS IS NOT MY SERVER I GAVE CREDITS AT TOP I JUST DOWNLOADED A LONG TIME AGO, BECAUSE I LOVE THIS SERVER I DECIDED TO RE-POST IT SO OTHER PEOPLE COULD DOWNLOAD IT, ALSO HUGE CREDITS TO @SHADOWSPKIN@[/b]
[b]PEOPLE PLEASE TAKE IT EASY, NO CREDITS TO ME WHAT SO EVER AT ALL, NADA, ZIP, ZERO. PLUS GIVE ME A BREAK, THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I HAVE EVER POSTED IN MY LIFE, I AM DEAD SERIOUS, I JUST WANTED TO BRING BACK THE MEMORIES OF THIS AWESOME SERVER, THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME.[/b]
